title: Lessons From Kubernetes and the Cloud Should Steer the AI Revolution
author: Mark Hinkle
description: Misconfigurations in the AI tech stack lead to mismanaged data ingestion, inefficient model training, and inadequate security gaps. Addressing these challenges requires not repeating the mistakes from our cloud and Kubernetes experiences.
cntitle: 从 Kubernetes 和云中汲取的教训应引导 AI 革命
cndescription: 人工智能技术堆栈中的错误配置会导致数据摄取管理不善、模型训练效率低下和安全漏洞不足。解决这些挑战需要不重复我们从云和 Kubernetes 经验中吸取的教训。
